reviews.review_msg: Heather Whiteside is a vindictive professor. She has a 0 tolerance policy for late submissions. This sounds reasonable in theory, until you understand that she leaves no room for nuance with this policy. A late submission, whether 1 minute or 3 hours late, will give you an automatic 0 in the assignment. That being said, her course is easy enough.

This professor is a fine enough person. She is really nice and I have had no issues with her. However, she is one of the worst lecturers I have ever had. She reads from a sheet of paper, and her voice is incredibly monotone. She made a subject I was interested in feel super dull. I would not take another class with her.

Avoid taking any courses from Dr. Whiteside at all costs. If you have enrolled in a course with her, I would drop out ASAP if that is possible and enrol in a different course. She is very unreasonable and not worth the time and effort her courses take. In all four years of university she is the worst prof I have had yet.
